concept.title: DNP3 WxW List

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Defines the dnp3 wxw point types and mapping instructions for proper telemetry and event reporting to scada systems.

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: map dnp3 wxw points for telemetry and event reporting

conbody.p:
The DNP3 data format is I:OB01:1
Index (I)
Object type (OB01/OB30)
Class mask (1/2)
conbody.note: Depending on the system type and design, some values might not be available.

section.title: Digital Values
section.p: Data format: BooleanExept for the data format 55:OB01:1 which is integer..

entry.ph: Status of the Modbus communication between the NMC and the HU250 (1 = OK, 3 = Interrupted).
